attributes.action: invite MP's to please listen when not talking!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I believe, and ask others to join me in this petition by expressing our disbelief at how remote our politicians from all parties once elected become in their attitude and assessment in their handling of what I call the real issues confronting this country today.
In no particular order, Law & Order, Housing, Immigration, Education, The National Health, Employment, Pensions and many more, are the issues where they have lost the ability to listen and more importantly act to calm the fears we all have as to where their actions or lack of are taking us.
